title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 260.10 - Record retention
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 260.10 - Record retention

State Regulations
(a) Each
life sciences research and development company shall keep all relevant records
for their duration of program participation plus three years. (b) The department shall have the right to
inspect all relevant records upon reasonable notice to the life sciences
research and development company. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
260.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
